```{r}
Wave1_data <- read_sav("Wave1_20170906.sav")
Wave1_data$index <- 1:nrow(Wave1_data)
```

```{r}
country_dist <- ggplot(data = Wave1_data, aes(x = q001, fill = as.factor(country))) +
  geom_bar(condition = "fill", fill = "lightblue", color = "black") +
  labs(x = "Economic Condition of Respondent",
       y = "Count",
       title = "Distribution of Economic Condition by Country")
```

Questions to average 121-148

```{r}
ideology_responses <- Wave1_data %>%
  select(idnumber, q121:q148)
```

```{r}
ideology_responses[is.na(ideology_responses)] <- 100000000
```

```{r}
na_sum <- ideology_responses %>%
  mutate(sum = rowSums(ideology_responses[])) %>%
  filter(sum <299999999)

#na_sum[na_sum > 100000] <- NA
```

```{r}
calc_avg <- na_sum %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(avg = mean(c(q121,q148)))

average_ideology <- select(calc_avg, c(idnumber, avg))
```
